item.description:
The Liberty Hotel is a former prison (click here) that has been transformed into a luxury hotel with several bars and restaurants. It maintains a prison theme and it's definitely worth taking a brief tour of the hotel before you have a drink. It's really cool!

 

The lobby bar has a menu (click here) and the manager told me that the bartenders have seasonal drinks and low-colorie (150cal) drinks.

 

LINES: I was told lines form on Friday nights so try to get there for 7pm.

HOW TO FIND US: Head to Clink (click here) and we'll be in the lobby.

DRESS CODE: This is a luxury hotel so you may not want to wear sneakers or tank-tops. Dress to impress.

LOCATION: The hotel is literally right next to MGH on the Red Line. Click here.

DRINK SPECIALS: They are not running specials right now, but as mentioned above, they do have some seasonal drinks.
item.name: Liberty Hotel-Lobby Outside Clink
